mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POKEMON (SEQ, NAME, WEIGHT, HEIGHT, BASE_EXPERIENCE, FRONT_IMAGE, BACK_IMAGE, RAW_DATA, NAME_KR, DESCRIPTION) VALUES (#{seq}, #{name}, #{weight}, #{height}, #{baseExperience}, #{frontImage}, #{backImage}, #{rawData}, #{nameKr}, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT P.SEQ, ROWNUM NUM, P.NAME, P.NAME_KR, P.WEIGHT, P.HEIGHT, P.BASE_EXPERIENCE, P.FRONT_IMAGE, P.BACK_IMAGE, P.RAW_DATA, P.DESCRIPTION FROM POKEMON P WHERE P.seq=#{seq}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM POKEMON
AND NAME || NAME_KR || DESCRIPTION LIKE #{keyword}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, P.* FROM POKEMON P ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE(0, 2000)) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
